author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
> Hi @ everyone if you see ERRO error computing light_client updates LightClientUpdateError(BeaconStateError(IncorrectStateVariant)), service: lc_update or similar you can safely ignore that
> 
> It will vanish once the Electra epoch is finalised 

From LH discord

author: sproul
content: sorry yeah, bad UX but you can safely ignore that (see LH announcements)
